llama_3_8b_instruct.note: Pricing is for running on a managed platform (e.g., Google Vertex AI). Meta's model is open source, free to self-host.

llama_3_70b_instruct.note: Pricing is for running on a managed platform. Meta's model is open source, free to self-host.

subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Unlimited usage at standard speed, faster during peak times, access to latest models.
Per user, per month. Included in enterprise suites with usage fairness policies.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High and growing rapidly, driven by consumer products bundling top-tier models for a flat fee.
pricing_analysis.trend: The market is experiencing a 'race to the bottom' for token prices, especially from competitive models in China (DeepSeek, Qwen) and efficient open-source variants (Llama 3, Haiku). Simultaneously, major providers are consolidating top-tier models into consumer-facing subscriptions (ChatGPT Plus, Claude Pro, Copilot), creating a hybrid pricing model of low-cost API access for developers and premium subscriptions for power users.
